Text: Its operating income was $1.8 billion, while net income decreased a little to $1.2 billion due to disposals.
Effect: Its operating income was $1.8 billion, while net income decreased a little to $1.2 billion
Sentence: <e2>Its operating income was $1.8 billion, while net income decreased a little to $1.2 billion</e2> due to <e1>disposals.</e1>
